articles.description: Lets users use UPI for recurring payments using any of the supported apps.
articles.content:
Google has introduced UPI Autopay option for Google Play users in India. This option can be used for all subscription-based payments going forward.
The UPI Autopay feature is part of the UPI 2.0 fea… [+1426 chars]
